access.title: Access Audiovook
access.placeholder: Validate your QR code token to continue to the player.
access.token_missing: Add the token query parameter to start validation.
access.token_invalid: We could not find a QR code with that token. Please check it and try again.
access.token_error: We could not validate your token right now. Try again in a moment.
access.demo_tokens_description: Use one of these seeded tokens when testing locally, then click to open its access page.

status.new: This token is ready to be registered with your device.
status.registered: This token is already registered. You can continue on your linked device.
status.blocked: This token has been blocked. Contact support if you need assistance.

player.title: Audiovook Player
player.description: The full-featured player interface is coming soon.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
